summary: This document appears to be a staff assignment or duty roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering dates in July and August 2019. It lists daily assignments, days off, and leave statuses for personnel, with the final timestamp coinciding with the period of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration prior to his death.

events.title: Staff Leave Without Pay

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the MCC New York covering the third quarter of 2019, specifically July and August.
The log shows various staff assignments to units like 'SHU #1' (Special Housing Unit), '11 SOUTH', '5 SOUTH', and '10 SOUTH', which are likely housing units within the jail.
Staff statuses include regular assignments ('DAN 8', 'OTEAN 12'), days off, sick leave, and leave without pay ('LWOP(M)').
The document was generated or printed on August 12, 2019, at 9:09:56 AM, which is during the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the MCC.
No specific individuals (inmates or staff) are named in this excerpt; it appears to be an internal administrative record tracking posts and leave.
